resources.string: This exercise is meant to lower your anxiety and expand the area where you feel safe.

This exercise is meant to lower your anxiety and expand the area where you feel safe.\n\nPeople with feelings similar to yours can have the tendency to focus too much on how they feel when at uncomfortable places. With this exercise, we try to help to better deal with such feelings.

There are two ways to start the exercise. It can be started manually with the button below, or Goalie can detect that you are at the designated exercise location.

During the exercise Goalie will ask you to enter your feelings of anxiety every two minutes. Once you arrive at the designated location, you can take a picture of something that you decided on together with your therapist.

You get 50 points for finishing the exercise. When you feel you have spent enough time at the location, you can stop the exercise manually.
Good job, you completed the exercise! You earned 50 points.
You are not at the designated location (yet)
Well done! You have arrived at the location. Now, please log your anxiety level.
It seems you have arrived at the designated location. Log your anxiety to start the exercise.
Don\'t forget to do your exercise this week!
You left the location. Go back to continue the exercise.
It looks like you did not complete the exercise to explore your environment this week. Maybe you could call your therapist and make sure you reach your goals next week?
It seems you did not take a picture…
